1999 Northeast ACF Regionals Tournament

The 1999 ACF Northeast Regional Championship will take place on Saturday, February 27, 1999 at MIT. Join us for a day chock-full of things that Matt Colvin thinks you should know! Each school must submit one pack of questions (written by only one team) to Dave Hamilton at Maryland (dhamiltn@wam.umd.edu) -- the deadline is 31 January. Question guidelines are here. More general packet guidelines are here.

Here's the fee schedule:

        $70 base fee
        -10 second team
        -15 pack in to Dave by 15 January (one discount per school)
        -5 for a (completely working) buzzer system
        -10 for an experienced game official
        -25 for a new school to the circuit

        $45 minimum fee
We promise the rooms are much closer together this time :-). We are going to limit schools to 2 teams initially, until we figure out how much space we have to spare.

So come one, come all, and enjoy our famous Beaver hospitality!

Jake Parrott
jparrott@mit.edu
TD, ACF Northeast Regionals
